instruction: Design a character from a novel or movie who embodies the given characteristics.
output: The character I created for this prompt is Kova, an elf who appears in the movie series The Lord of the Rings. Kova is an independent spirit who knows how to get things done. She is resourceful and uses her knowledge of herbs and plants to create potions and salves to help her allies. She is also loyal to her friends and is always willing to go to extraordinary lengths to help them.
